name: UpdateMemberNote
description:
Update a specific note for a list member in Mailchimp.

This tool updates a specific note for a given list member on Mailchimp. Use this when you need to modify the content of an existing note associated with a subscriber in a mailing list.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the mailing list where the note is being updated.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: member_identifier
parameters.description: The MD5 hash, email address, or contact_id of the list member.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address. This endpoint also accepts a list member's email address or contact_id.

parameters.name: note_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the note to be updated.

parameters.name: note_content
parameters.description: Content of the note to be updated. Must not exceed 1,000 characters.

value_schema.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: subscriber_hash
parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address. This endpoint also accepts a list member's email address or contact_id.

value_schema.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address. This endpoint also accepts a list member's email address or contact_id.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

value_schema.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
